Dermatopathology Laboratory of Central States (DLCS)
Revolutionizing the Dermatology Industry
Overview
DLCS is an independent skin pathology laboratory located in Ohio, USA. Cloud Interactive provided DLCS with a customized digital solution that integrates advanced touchscreen technology, digital slide scanning, and cloud storage technology. This project enabled DLCS to increase revenue, expand market share, and more effectively manage complex customer relationships.
Challenge: Complex Workflows in the Dermatology Industry
DLCS, an internationally accredited pathology testing laboratory, was challenged to meet the need for increasingly digitized pathology testing programs. In this business space, dermatopathology workflows are becoming increasingly complex, while ever-decreasing subsidies challenge laboratories to seek new operational efficiencies.
User Centric Design and Engineering
Championing a User-Centered Design approach, Cloud Interactive conducted research to gain a deep understanding of pathology testing workflows and priorities. Through business-process analysis & redesign, usability analysis, and software design, Cloud Interactive built tools which allowed DLCS to excel in the Dermatology Industry.In our continuing partnership with DLCS, Cloud Interactive works to improve and integrate skin tissue processing, data analysis processes, and Electronic Medical Record (EMR) systems. Our shared goal is to increase productivity with less overhead and better customer satisfaction, and to maintain DLCSs position as a market leader.
Custom-Tailored Digital Workflows
Cloud Interactive created a revolutionary software system which leverages advances in multi-touch screen technologies, digital slide scanning, tissue tracking, cloud storage capabilities and rapid data streaming, to catapult DLCS into the era of digital pathology.This new system also integrates seamlessly with DLCS legacy software platforms, including: ClearPath, integrated laboratory management applications, and digital microscope applications. As part of a total solution, the Cloud Interactives solution also includes ELLKAYS connectivity to bridge data with hospital EMR systems.
A New Generation of Dermatopathology
Cloud Interactives innovative software system integrates state-of-the-art technological innovation with conventional dermatopathology practice. Through this digital environment, DLCS can provide telemedicine services anywhere, any time.The tools this system provides dermatologists and skin pathologists, including skin tissue processing, slide tracking, and analysis, allows them to not only provide an indispensable service, but anticipate patient needs. As skin pathologists interact with more DLCS, their productivity increases, their patients receive better care, and their medical practices grow.
